name: Bug Arena
description:
Face off against many waves of enemies as The Moth and see how long you can last in this gladiator arena for bugs!

Dodge through enemies and arm yourself with various weapons in this hack and slash game.

  • Single-player 3d hack and slash
  • PC
  • Keyboard / mouse and Xbox controller support

CONTROLS

Keyboard / Mouse:

  • Movement – WASD
  • Light attack – Left mouse button
  • Heavy attack – Right mouse button
  • Dodge – Space
  • Swap weapon – F
  • Rotate camera – Q / E
  • Pause – ESC

Xbox controller:

  • Movement – Left stick
  • Light attack – B
  • Heavy attack  – Y
  • Dodge – A
  • Swap weapon – X
  • Rotate camera – LB / RB
  • Pause - Start
